category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCVIS_enable_NGC_feature
preference.preference_description: Enables the feature of expand and visualize Non Geometry Component (NGC) node. Valid Values: * true: Enables the feature of expand and visualize NGC node. This is the default value. * false: Doesn't enable the feature of expand and visualize NGC node irrespective of what value has been set for the preference "TCVIS_allow_NGC_expand".
